title: ChecklistItem
description: A single item in a checklist artifact. Each item has an ID, title, optional description, and an optional status specification (boolean or enum). If status is omitted, a default boolean status may be assumed (implementation-defined).

id.description: Unique identifier for the checklist item (e.g., "task-1", "step-a"). Used to link to runtime status.

title.description: Title or label for the checklist item

description.description: Detailed description or instructions for the item

status.title: StatusSpec
status.description: Specification for how checklist item status should be represented (boolean or enum).

anyOf.title: BooleanStatusSpec
anyOf.description: Boolean status (e.g., incomplete/complete) with an optional default value.

default.description: Default status value (true/false) for new instances

anyOf.title: EnumStatusSpec
anyOf.description: Enum-based status with a set of allowed options and an optional default.

label.description: Human-readable label for the status option

description.description: Optional description or help text for this status option

default.description: Default status value for new instances (must match one of the option values)
